attributes.action: Make our journeys safe. Subsidise  safe travel for solo women after dark.
attributes.additional_details:
We do not need plainclothes officers in nightclubs  That is a job for the security who already work there.  We need to get home and move safely on the streets after dark.

With  many taxi apps available 24/7 this petition asks for funding to subsidise a women only extension or a new stand alone service.  Cap the journey fee so that no woman or girl has to walk alone at night.
attributes.background:
Government needs to safeguard and support women to move freely and safely.

This petition is asking for a subsidised car service, by women for  solo women to travel safely and affordably in the hours of darkness.

rejection.details:
The Government is not responsible for creating on-demand travel services. This is a matter for taxi and private hire vehicle operators.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to create a fund to subsidise the cost of night-time travel by private car service, to better enable people to travel safely at night, or provide funding for additional local late-night transport services for women.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Fund free bus travel for women and children after sunset: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579263
